item.description:
Topic: Does Art Imitate Life or Life Imitate Art? Does Buddhism recognize any distinction between the two? Join us as we explore Buddhism's perspective on the creative process. We will focus on poetry as well as shodo (Japanese) calligraphy, an example of which if featured on our nembutsu scroll. Also, we will pause to recognize and celebrate Gotan-e, Shinran Shonin's (founder of Shin Buddhism) birthday. Presented by Pamela Mulready.

See our CALENDAR OF TOPICS and BUDDHIST RETREATS. See our main web site:

www.bffct.net
item.how_to_find_us: Mansfield Freeman Center is towards the end of the road next to cementary.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Middletown Buddhist Meetup Group
